name: Batch Rename
author: Ahmed Al Haddad
description: A better and more powerful batch rename plugin for Figma. Provides tons of options (thanks to Sketch Renamer). Accessible via the toolbar button or keyboard shortcut CTRL/CMD + SHIFT + R.
instructions: Select 2 or more layers, right click and select 'Batch Rename', or press CTRL/CMD + SHIFT + R.

updates.notes: Restructured the plugin to be usable by plugin manager.
